was the hardest thing youve ever done
the hardest thing youve ever done
but you try to do whats right
and i know deep down inside

not when its because of me
yeah yeah yeah

ill never love another ill never love another

that we said last night that we said last night
baby i dont wanna say goodbye i dont wanna say no no no no no no no no no

that inside im really really crackin up
